root: ^Someone here told me he saw a man in a blue and yellow uniform.
^Now that you say it, I do remember a pet shop in this region that uses the same colors, it also opened a capaign to help street animals.
^Do you remember the pet shop's name?
^Sadly no, as I said earlier, my memory isn't great.
^No problem, that was already very helpful information.
^The case has been progressing nicely, there's now only one person left to talk to.
